body:
Comment 1: 
the fix for this particular issue was actually elsewhere (see
http://golang.org/cl/2337044/), but the issue
of serveSend doing a synchronous channel send is still pertinent.

attached is another source file which causes a deadlock
even with the fix applied.

i have another fix, which i'll send in when the above CL is submitted.
it involves adding flow control to the netchan protocol.
Attachments: 1. tst.go (1703 bytes)
